//NOTE_KEY_INPUTS//: Please specify OUT_PATH, MODE, and filepath_list (input images)
//Choises for MODE//: normal or single or desert or swd
//Flood image//: The first one in the filepath_list should be the flood image
//granules//: [SAR_name_1],[SAR_name_2],... a list of SAR granules (optional), will extract from input file path/urls if not provided
//note_parameters//: Bellow is parameters, is it recommended to keep them default
//Choises for blockSize//: 'auto'(Double quotes) or an integer, turns out that a median size is better
